group_1.textLeft: You were one of those girls!

group_1.textRight: What's wrong?@Is she a friend of yours, Kaede?
That's almost exactly what@I said to Momoko back then!
Whoa! Is this like, a coincidence?@That's so cool!

group_1.narration: She was one of the three girls on the street@that I'd shown my sketches to.
It just so happened that she showed up at@my workshop.
She was with different girls this time,@but...
I had this strange feeling that@something was going to happen!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but I hardly know her myself...

group_1.textRight: Huh? Really?@So how do you know her anyway?

group_1.narration: She explained the situation to the girls I@didn't know.
She kept parts of it vague...

group_1.textCenter: Whoa! A clothing design artist!@I'm totally into that too!
So like, what kinda clothes are they?

group_1.narration: She couldn't keep that part vague...
I was getting the feeling that this girl@would be just like the other one...
That rude girl that hurt my feelings!

group_1.textCenter: I wanna see! I wanna see!@I wonder if she has any right now.

group_1.narration: I do...@I mean, I always have them with me...
But I was still feeling so troubled @and vulnerable...
If someone said one more mean thing to@me, I'd have fallen into a pit of despair!

group_1.textLeft: So should we ask her to show them to us?

group_1.narration: You're not going to stop her?!
...But I can't let my nerves beat me now!
I'm gonna face it head-on!@I'm gonna just go for it!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I have some right here...@Would you like to see?

group_1.textRight: Thanks!@Hmm, I wonder what they're like?

group_1.narration: Into the pit of despair I went!
